Michael Stack writes:
> A commit I made earlier today was supposed to avoid your seeing this 
> exception.  Did you update recently?  If not, try setting your 
> 'max-length-bytes' to 0 in your fancy profile and in the problematic job 
> in the FetchHTTP section.  Otherwise, I'm interested.

I updated right after your note saying you fixed this, but the change
must not have percolated to the anonymous server.

Once I made the 'max-length-bytes' change I'm able to crawl, though I
get a disturbingly small number of documents (i.e., 14) when I expect
a couple of orders of magnitude more than that. Investigating to see
what stupid thing I've done now.

    -tree
